discussion_comments.comment_body: make sure to replicate these changes in `alacritty_macos.yml` as well :+1:
Oh nice, I didn't know you could bind multiple actions the same key binding. This solves the issue I was having more easily.

You couldn't. Until I wrote this patch to make it possible. :D 

Check out the changes in `src/input.rs`, it was fairly simple so I thought that this would be the best solution.

Yea I can see that. It's not immediately obvious, but makes sense why it works. I can imagine some weird binding shadowing issues but generally I like this.

I mostly like it here because it keeps the clear history action straightforward, without needing to worry about moving the lines.

With the previous configuration double bindings would just silently be ignored, like this they're both used. If it would have caused errors previously I think this would be a far more severe change, but like this it should actually make things more transparent and less error prone.

Or that was my train of thought at least. But I was trying to justify the change after the fact. :D
I'd love to see someone on macOS actually verify this, but it worked just fine when I changed command to control and added it to my keybindings.
Yeah completely agree with that sentiment. I tested it on Linux by changing it to `Control`, but it's always better to be safe than sorry. :D
